statements: DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 202 AND transaction_type = 'refund';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE fraud_status = TRUE AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM fraud_anomalies WHERE status = 'under review' AND detected_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '2 weeks';
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND transaction_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fraud_cases WHERE resolved = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraud_cases WHERE resolved = false;
DELETE FROM AnomalyAnalysis WHERE anomaly_type = 'High Risk';
DELETE FROM AnomalyAnalysis WHERE anomaly_type = 'unusual' AND detection_id IN (SELECT detection_id FROM FraudDetection WHERE detection_score > 0.8);
